FuncDef: The virtual-cable-test command tests the working state of a cable connected to an Ethernet interface and displays the test result. The virtual-cable-test command tests the working state of a cable connected to an Ethernet interface and displays the test result.
ParentView: 10GE interface view,25GE interface view,Management interface view
Examples: Warning: This operation will take several minutes. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
ExtraInfo: A cable fault may cause the interface to go down or the interface rate to become abnormal even if the interface is up. You can run this command to check whether a cable is faulty and locate the failure point. If the cable is not faulty, the length in the command output indicates the cable's total length. If the cable is faulty, the length in the command output is the length from the interface to the failure point.
